floodArea.riverOrSea: River Brathay, River Rothay, River Winster

items.message:
River levels are high on the Rivers Brathay, Rothay and Winster and other nearby watercourses due to heavy rainfall, with potential flooding to low lying areas around Ambleside, Skelwith Bridge, Windermere, Hawkshead, Newby Bridge, Backbarrow, Cark and Cartmel.
Further heavy showers are forecast throughout the weekend and into Monday.
Avoid using low lying footpaths and any bridges near local watercourses and do not attempt to walk or drive through flood water.
The Rivers Brathay, Rothay and Winster are expected to remain high today (12/08/2023) and through the weekend and we do not currently expect any further flooding to properties.
This message will be updated by 11:59 AM on 13/08/2023, or as the situation changes.
